original_text: And the king of Israel answered, “Tell him, ‘Let not him who straps on his armor boast himself as he who takes it off.’”
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 대답하여 이르되 갑옷 입는 자가 갑옷 벗는 자 같이 자랑하지 못할 것이라 하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Israel answered,
‘Let not him who straps on his armor boast himself
as he who takes it off.’”
